mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sixlog2 SET log_tags=#{logTags}, log_content=#{logContent},log_cover=#{logCover}, ownerId=#{ownerId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.`log_content`, s.`log_cover`, s.`log_date`, s.`log_tags`, u.cname as ownerName, u.userface as ownerFaceUrl FROM sixlog2 s, user u WHERE s.ownerId=u.id ORDER BY s.`log_date` desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{size};

SELECT s.id, s.`log_content`, s.`log_cover`, s.`log_date`, s.`log_tags`, u.cname as ownerName, u.userface as ownerFaceUrl FROM sixlog2 s, user u WHERE s.ownerId=u.id AND s.`log_tags` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tag}, '%') ORDER BY s.`log_date` desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{size};
